Text:
...and what songbird MEANT to add (I'm sure) is more of a description of the novel....like:

The Land of Stories tells the tale of twins Alex and Conner. Through the mysterious powers of a cherished book of stories, they leave their world behind and find themselves in a foreign land full of wonder and magic where they come face-to-face with the fairy tale characters they grew up reading about.

Can you guys seed please? I've been with this torrent for 13hrs 47mins and haven't even downloaded 1B... Also, if anyone knows where to get a pdf or something version, please do let me know or leave a link =)
